name: CupertinoDatePicker
desc: A date picker widget in iOS style.

fields.name: mode
fields.desc: The mode of the date picker as one of [CupertinoDatePickerMode]. Defaults to [CupertinoDatePickerMode.dateAndTime]. Value cannot change after initial build.

fields.name: initialDateTime
fields.desc: The initial date and/or time of the picker. Defaults to the present date and time. The present must conform to the intervals set in [minimumDate], [maximumDate], [minimumYear], and [maximumYear].

fields.name: minimumDate
fields.desc: The minimum selectable date that the picker can settle on.

fields.name: maximumDate
fields.desc: The maximum selectable date that the picker can settle on.

fields.name: minimumYear
fields.desc: Minimum year that the picker can be scrolled to in [CupertinoDatePickerMode.date] mode. Defaults to 1.

fields.name: maximumYear
fields.desc: Maximum year that the picker can be scrolled to in [CupertinoDatePickerMode.date] mode. Null if there's no limit.

fields.name: minuteInterval
fields.desc: The granularity of the minutes spinner, if it is shown in the current mode. Must be an integer factor of 60.

fields.name: use24hFormat
fields.desc: Whether to use 24 hour format. Defaults to false.

fields.name: dateOrder
fields.desc: Determines the order of the columns inside [CupertinoDatePicker] in [CupertinoDatePickerMode.date] and [CupertinoDatePickerMode.monthYear] mode. When using monthYear mode, both [DatePickerDateOrder.dmy] and [DatePickerDateOrder.mdy] will result in the month|year order. Defaults to the locale's default date format/order.

fields.name: onDateTimeChanged
fields.desc: Callback called when the selected date and/or time changes. If the new selected [DateTime] is not valid, or is not in the [minimumDate] through [maximumDate] range, this callback will not be called.

fields.name: showDayOfWeek
fields.desc: Whether to show the day of week alongside the day in [CupertinoDatePickerMode.date] mode.

fields.name: showTimeSeparator
fields.desc: Whether to show the time separator between hour and minute in the time [CupertinoDatePickerMode.time] and datetime [CupertinoDatePickerMode.dateAndTime] picker modes.

fields.name: selectionOverlayBuilder
fields.desc: A function that returns a widget that is overlaid on the picker to highlight the currently selected entry.
